46 minutes ago, Dfthu said:

supply and demand my friend. Now they would go for a high price but if someone brings a bunch of them the costs goes down. I would say 1-2 diamonds per slimeball or a stack of coal blocks.

Like, if someone made a slime farm. And a witch farm. And an automatic potion maker. And a mob farm. And they did this all in their land far away from spawn, then transported it over to a shop using a nether tunnel. The someone is TOTALLY not me.

Thanks to everyone who has approved this
All votes are final
The "No's" have been out voted
The "Yes'" have it! 
Crafting Ideas and crafting material Ideas are accepted

[Jobs]
Crafting Ideas: Open|KAL 9000
Coder: Closed|Sparky
Pixel Artist: Open(one space left)|Sparky

[Any armor/Clothing ideas are accepted]

I will be making a server mod which adds
Spacesuits(kerbal space suit, nasa space suit, fox empire space suit)
Costumes(example: Dictator costume, skin costumes, ect)
Nanosuits(you'll love my nano suits, 4 different versions with a visor overlay and 1 uniqe perk each)
1 sword 1 gem(improved gold sword thats that 1 tier better than diamond)

Everyone cool with this?
more armor, costumes and suits will be added
I also MAY take requests
heres an example

2 hours ago, Dfthu said:

sparky said either south of forids tower or around pines house/the condos.

That's still very close to Sanctuary. From a high enough altitude, like from a tower, you can probably see Sanctuary from either of those places.

2 hours ago, SparkyFox said:

or outside the sanctuary map so paradise has its own unique map

Like, a different world save? Then by conventional means you couldn't even get between the places. You'd have to use portals or something. It's possible, but difficult and a hassle.

I say we put it in the same world save but far away (on the scale of hundreds or thousands of blocks). Also should be near an ocean.

I say we put it in the same world save but far away (on the scale of hundreds or thousands of blocks). Also should be near an ocean.

this is sanctuary  and this this is paradise [P] and is the sanctuary board map [         ] [P]

mk wanted to have paradise outside the board map so paradise would have its own map if you get what im trying to say

Edited October 24, 2016 by SparkyFox

I have an idea for the spacesuit crafting recipes! How I represent a crafting grid with text is this:

X X X 

X X X 

X X X 

Where X is nothing, and you replace it with whatever material it is. 

First off: A super-strong material that you would use to craft spacesuits: Kevlar 

X Iron Ingot X 

String Leather String 

X Iron Ingot X 

Gives you 4 Kevlar. 

Next: A tough version of glass needed for a spacesuit visor.

X Iron Ingot X 

Iron Ingot Glass Pane Iron Ingot 

X Iron Ingot X 

Gives you 1 Glass-X Pane. 

Spacesuit Helmet: 

Kevlar Kevlar Kevlar 

Kevlar Glass-X Pane Kevlar 

X X X 

For the suit's life support, a few crafting recipes: 

Redstone Iron Ingot Redstone 

Ice Redstone Magma Block 

Redstone Iron Ingot Redstone 

Gives you 1 Thermal Control System (The Redstone circuitry redirects air to pass over the Magma Block when you are cold and the Ice when you are hot). 

X Redstone X 

X Glass-X Pane X 

X Iron Ingot X 

Gives you 1 Oxygen Tank (self-explanatory). 

Iron Ingot Redstone Iron Ingot 

Oxygen Tank Redstone Oxygen Tank 

Iron Ingot Redstone Iron Ingot 

Gives you 1 CO2 Scrubber (also self-explanatory). 

Kevlar X Kevlar 

Oxygen Tank Thermal Control System CO2 Scrubber 

Kevlar Kevlar Kevlar 

Gives you 1 Spacesuit Torso. 

Kevlar Kevlar Kevlar 

Kevlar X Kevlar 

Kevlar X Kevlar 

Gives you 1 Spacesuit Leggings. 

X X X 

Kevlar X Kevlar 

Kevlar X Kevlar 

Gives you 1 Spacesuit Boots. 

I have 1 idea for an additional feature: 

Redstone Iron Ingot Redstone 

Iron Pickaxe Crafting Table Shears 

Redstone Iron Ingot Redstone 

Would give you a Repair Workbench. 

Basically, you put a tool or armor piece in it, as well as some furnace fuel to power it, and it regains durability over time. Sorta like having Mending on it while it's in there.

Are you able to make like a Mars dimension or something? That would go well with it.

A realistic one, though.  Like water freezes, it snows at sunset which sublimes at sunrise, lower gravity, dies without spacesuit, etc. Something similar was done in Galacticraft but that had aliens which wasn't too realistic so I didn't like it.

I don't care. As long as space stuff stays in space and not in front of my house I'm fine with it!

11 minutes ago, SparkyFox said:

Do you approve though? right now, its going to be clothing and armor and a sword

Usually I don't like mods, but I'm ok with it as long as 

  1. The overworld stays the same. 
  2. The mod isn't too overpowered. 
  3. The mod doesn't make the server too laggy. 

Edit: 

4. Everyone doesn't spend all their time in the other dimensions and make me lonely. 

Edited October 24, 2016 by max_creative
So yes. Ish.
